titles.title: Modern Love Tokyo: Kare ga Kanaderu Futari no Shirabe
The Melody of Two People that He Plays
モダンラブ・東京 ~彼が奏でるふたりの調べ~
Modern Love Tokyo: He's Playing Our Song

data.title: Modern Love Tokyo: Kare ga Kanaderu Futari no Shirabe
data.title_english: Modern Love Tokyo: He's Playing Our Song
data.title_japanese: モダンラブ・東京 ~彼が奏でるふたりの調べ~
title_synonyms: The Melody of Two People that He Plays
data.synopsis:
Though her high school days are long behind her, Tamami Sakurai is still just as awkward and clumsy as ever. At night, she is often seen at a local Tokyo bar, which has become a safe haven from her stressful job. After a few too many drinks, Tamami begins to feel as if she is invincible, but the hangover afterward begs to differ.

One such night ends on a disparate note when an intoxicated Tamami hears some familiar chords playing on the record player, bringing tears to her eyes as she recalls bygone years. The melody reminds her of a shy pianist named Rin Kajitani—a boy who was once the closest friend she ever had.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
data.background: Modern Love Tokyo: Kare ga Kanaderu Futari no Shirabe was released as part of Amazon Studios' Modern Love Tokyo anthology series. It is the only animated episode featured in the live-action series.

openings: "Setting Sail ~Modern Love Tokyo~ (Setting Sail ~モダンラブ・東京~)" by Awesome City Club
endings: "YOU MAY DREAM" by Sheena & The Rokkets
